title: Dresden Sofa
description:
Introduce our new design for the Dresden sofa. Features leatherette upholstery and rich cherry oak finish with matching occasional table, this sofa collection creates an elegant and traditional design into your living room. Hand-Crafted pieces inspired from the luxurious design of the past, the new Dresden sofa features elaborate wood carving details and a sophisticated style that give your living space a comfort and royal atmosphere.
